item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - Doowop - Best of Doowop Volume 2
item.description:
Best Of Doowop Volume 2
Genre: Doowop, Rock n Roll, Sock Hop, 50's, 60's

All tracks are in MP3 (FLOAT) 44100hz approx 256kbps.

Tracks
Best Of DooWop Vol.02 68:48

01 My Lonely Friend - Continentals
02 I Don't Want To Go - Accensions
03 Earth Angel - Alan Silvestri
04 Why Am I So Shy - Andrea Carroll
05 Angel - Marie Ernie & The Halos
06 Judy My Love - Pepe And The Astros
07 This I Swear - Bandaleers
08 Tonight Tonight - Barries
09 I Don't Want You - Barry Lane & Group
10 Really Paradise - Beautiggin
11 Tell Me Why - Belairs
12 In My Lonely Room - Bi Tones
13 Sh Boom - The Big Six
14 Forever - Blen-Dells
15 I Found A New Love - Blue Belles
16 Doo-Wop All Night Long - Blue Emotions
17 Thank You Mr Moon - Blue Sonnets
18 Duchess Of Earl - Bobbie Smith And Dream Girls
19 Why Did You Go - Bobbi-Pins
20 Your Boyfriend's Back - Bobby Comstock
21 Pamela - Bobby Fuller Four
22 Blue Jean - Bobby Gee & The Celestials
23 It Was A Lie - Bobby Moore
24 So Why - Bopchords
25 Let's Fall In Love - Boyfriends
26 Angel Of Mine - Boys
27 Angel Baby - Charles Brown & Group
28 Sixty Minute Man - Cadet


Support the artist and buy Doowop Music!
https://music.apple.com/us/search?term=doowop

Credits to me for the album cover!
